name: ∞ Year Survival
description:
This game is ref from Vampire Survivors 
Story : U just live like other people but something change your world to something you can identify. You should survive to 30 minutes for solve the real

Key :
WASD for Move

ESC for Pause Menu

This is my Final project for University but this game isn't complete but u can play this game for give me a motivation :) . I will update this game continuously as i can.

We have a facebook fanpage for update any new for my game
Project-A BU | Facebook This Page belong toThai language but in future i'll add English language

If u don't want to spent your time for this game. u can go to play Vampire Survivors :/
